QuestData.Title: Commander in the Field!
QuestData.Description: This battle will be won, but it will be hard fought. Our rangari did manage to get a few scouts out to the rest of the jungle though.$b$bPerhaps it is best you collect this intelligence yourself and see what this jungle holds for us all.
QuestData.LogDescription: Get reports from various scouts in Tanaan Jungle.
QuestData.RewardText: This will be a difficult campaign to be sure.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with the scout in southwest Tanaan Jungle
Speak with the scout in northwest Tanaan Jungle
Speak with the scout in northeast Tanaan Jungle
